title: GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto - Lightweight, Powerful Pro Salon Blow Dryer with Diffuser & 2 Concentrator Nozzle Attachment Tools (Under 1LB)
descriptions:
**GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto**

**Professional Hair Drying at Its Finest**

Experience the ultimate in hair drying technology with the GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto. This high-performance dryer is designed to deliver salon-quality results in the comfort of your own home.

**Key Features**

- **Lightweight and Ergonomic Design**: Weighing under 1LB, this dryer is designed for comfort and ease of use, with an ergonomic design that fits perfectly in your hand.
- **Fast and Powerful**: With a 1700W brushless motor, this dryer is 30% faster than other dryers and 7 times faster than traditional hair dryers, making it perfect for those with thick or curly hair.
- **Advanced Air Flow Design**: The multiplies air flow design ensures that your hair is dried quickly and evenly, reducing frizz and enhancing shine.
- **Oxy Active Technology**: This innovative technology helps to nourish and protect your hair, leaving it looking healthy and vibrant.
- **Attachments**: The dryer comes with a diffuser and 2 concentrator nozzles, allowing you to customize your drying experience and achieve the perfect style.
- **Innovative Microfilter**: The microfilter prevents tiny dirt particles from entering the dryer, ensuring that your hair is protected from damage and impurities.
- **Auto Clean Technology**: The auto clean feature makes it easy to keep your dryer clean and in good working order.
- **LED Memory Configuration**: With 18 customizable settings and an LED display, you can easily find and save your perfect drying settings. The auto diagnosis feature also helps to identify and resolve any issues with the dryer.

**Available Colors**

- Silver
- Black

**Product Specifications**

- Weight: Under 1LB
- Motor Power: 1700W
- Motor Speed: 7 times faster than traditional hair dryers
- Drying Speed: 30% faster than other dryers
- Air Flow Design: Multiplies air flow
- Ergonomics: Ergonomic and sleek with Oxy Active Technology
- Attachments: Diffuser, 2 concentrator nozzles
- Cleaning: Auto clean technology, microfilter
- Settings: 18 customizable settings with LED display and auto diagnosis

**Order Now and Experience the Power of Professional Hair Drying**

Don't settle for anything less than the best. Order the GAMA Italy Professional Hair Dryer Rose Gold - IQ Perfetto today and discover a new world of hair drying possibilities.
